name: Jungle Fruit Splash
description:
Jungle Fruit Splash: A match 3 will take you to the adventure in the jungle. The Red Evil takes control of the Jungle and the food. With the help of Jungle fairies, your mission is to defeat the Red Evil and save all the creatures from starving by collecting the fruits to feed them.

Jungle Fruit Splash: A match 3 brings to you a new way of playing match 3 puzzle games with new mechanics and exciting features such as boss fighting, food gathering.

Main Features:
* 200 awesome levels and more levels will be updated in the future!
* Show off your high score with your Facebook friends!
* Daily bonus for all users!
* Tons of new and interesting mechanics!
* Many fantastic combos to reach the goal!
* Intense boss battles!
